segments.text: Good morning . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I hate to disturb you , but I really can't stand it any more . Can you change my room for me ? It's too noisy . I was woken up several times by the noise the baggage elevator made . It was too much for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that . This room is at the end of the corridor . It's possible that the noise is heard early in the morning when everything is quiet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anyhow , I'd like to change my room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm awfully sorry , Miss . I do apologize . We'll manage it , but we don't have any spare room today . Could you wait till tomorrow ? A tour company will be leaving tomorrow morning . There'll be some rooms for you to choose from .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . I hope I'll be able to enjoy my stay in a quiet suite tomorrow evening and have a sound sleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Be sure . And if there is anything more you need , please let us know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're welcome . I hope you'll be more comfortable in your new room .
segments.speaker: S1
